WordTranslation: n.雨 vi.下雨；像雨一样下
Example: It has been raining all night and it looks like it's not going to stop.
ExampleTranslation: 雨已经下了一整晚，并且似乎还不会停。

WordTranslation: n.阵雨 vi.下起阵雨 vt.大量给予
Example: John was showered with congratulations when he was promoted.
ExampleTranslation: 约翰荣升时，大家纷纷向他道贺。

Example: Will you pour me a glass of milk?
ExampleTranslation: 帮我倒一杯牛奶好吗？

Example: According to the weather forecast;it is going to hail tomorrow.
ExampleTranslation: 据天气预报，明天会下冰雹。

Example: Ihere is a blanket of snow over the mountain.
ExampleTranslation: 山上覆着一层白雪。

Example: It is beginning to cloud over;you'd better take an umbrella with you.
ExampleTranslation: 这天开始变阴了，你最好带上一把伞。

Example: I hope it will clear up soon.
ExampleTranslation: 我希望天气尽快放晴。

Example: We tried our best to keep out of the sun.
ExampleTranslation: 我们尽可能不被阳光照到。

Example: The mountain was soon blanketed with snow.
ExampleTranslation: 那座山很快就莜一层雪覆盖了。

Example: The ice in the glass began to melt in the hot sun.
ExampleTranslation: 在炽热的阳光下，杯子里的冰块开始融化了。

Example: The air is thick with dust.
ExampleTranslation: 空气中布满了灰尘。

Example: It looks like the miserable weather is going to linger Tor a long time.
ExampleTranslation: 这令人难受的天气似乎将会持续很久。

Example: The temperature is minus 10 degrees Centigrade.
ExampleTranslation: 气温是零下10摄氏度。

Example: The bicycle outside has iced up.
ExampleTranslation: 外面那辆自行车已经结冰了。

WordTranslation: n.冻结;结冰 vi.冻结;结冰 vt.冻结;结冰
Example: The lake froze during the winter.
ExampleTranslation: 冬天湖水结冰了。

Example: I missed the forecast;so I don't know whether it's going to rain or not.
ExampleTranslation: 我错过了天气预报，所以我不知道会不会下雨。

Example: The sonw accumulated during the night.
ExampleTranslation: 雪积了一晚上。

Example: Heavy rainfall ruined the game.
ExampleTranslation: 骤雨让比赛泡汤了。

Example: Farmers cultivate soil to grow crops.
ExampleTranslation: 农民耕地种谷物。

Example: Few people live in arid areas because there isn't enough food.
ExampleTranslation: 很少人居住在干旱地区，因为没有足够的食物。

Example: A hillside with warm and humid soil is heaven for tea trees.
ExampleTranslation: 有着温暖湿润土壤的山坡，是茶树的天堂。

Example: The country has a mild climate.
ExampleTranslation: 该国气候温和。

Example: The fields are lush with grass and flowers.
ExampleTranslation: 田野长满了绿意盎然的花草。

Example: The southwest region has sparse vegetation.
ExampleTranslation: 西南部地区植被稀少。

Example: The range stretches for 200km along the coast.
ExampleTranslation: 范围沿着海岸绵延达200千米。

Example: New Zealand is known for its rugged terrain and hospitable people.
ExampleTranslation: 新西兰以其崎岖的地形和热情好客的人民而闻名。

Example: The Mississippi River empties into the Gulf of Mexico.
ExampleTranslation: 密西西比河注入墨西哥湾。

Example: The boundary between the desert and the city is changing every day.
ExampleTranslation: 这片沙漠与这座城市间的边界每天都在改变。

Example: Rice plants should be cultivated on fertile land.
ExampleTranslation: 稻米要种植在肥沃的土地上。

Example: The country is abundant in mineral resources.
ExampleTranslation: 这个国家富含矿产资源。

WordTranslation: vt.放牧;(牛羊等)吃草 vi.放牧;(牛羊等)吃草
Example: The grassy hillside is ideal to graze your sheep on.
ExampleTranslation: 这青草繁茂的山坡是放羊的理想地。

Example: We must exploit the natural resources in moderation.
ExampleTranslation: 我们必须适度地开发天然资源。

Example: Ihe island is located at 100 degrees east longitude and 25 degrees north latitude.
ExampleTranslation: 达座岛位于东经一百度，北纬二十五度。

Example: Shirley lost her job and broke up with her boyfriend.
ExampleTranslation: 雪莉丢了工作，又和她的男友分手丁，简直是祸不单行。

Example: Since it's raining cats and dogs;let's go to the movies.
ExampleTranslation: 既然现在下着大雨，咱们去看电影吧。

Word: save/keep money for a rainy day
WordTranslation: 存钱以备不时之需;未雨绸缪
Example: John was taught to save money for a rainy day when he was a little child.
ExampleTranslation: 约翰年幼时就被教育要存钱以备不时之需。

Example: After a few days of rest;Judy is as right as rain again.
ExampleTranslation: 休息几天后，朱迪又恢复了健康。

WordTranslation: 风雨无阻;不管发生什么
Example: Rain or shine;Tim is always the first one to arrive at the office.
ExampleTranslation: 无论刮风下雨，蒂姆总是第一个到达办公室。

Example: Jenny asked if she could take a rain check on the dinner.
ExampleTranslation: 珍妮询问她是否能下次再约吃晚餐。

Example: I'm sorry to rain on your parade;but you're not a good cook.
ExampleTranslation: 我很抱歉泼你冷水，但是你不太会做菜。

Example: The share price rose rapidly today;but everyone knew it's merely the calm before the storm.
ExampleTranslation: 今天的股价急速上升，但所有人都知道这不过是暴风雨前的平静。

Example: The bride was angry because her bridesmaids stole her thunder at the wedding.
ExampleTranslation: 新娘气坏了，因为她的伴娘们在婚礼上抢了她的风头。

Example: Jenny was on cloud nine when she got promoted.
ExampleTranslation: 珍妮升职时，简直乐不可支。

Example: The whole problem tumned out to be a tempest in a teapot.
ExampleTranslation: 整个问题到头来只是在小题大做而已。

Example: It is a breeze for me to help you with the housework.
ExampleTranslation: 帮你做家务对我来说简直是小事一桩。

Example: Everyone was snowed under with work before the long holidays.
ExampleTranslation: 长假前所有人都忙于工作。

Example: Telling jokes is a good way to break the ice.
ExampleTranslation: 讲笑话是个打破僵局的好办法。

Example: Emma always seems to get wind of gossip before anyone else in the office.
ExampleTranslation: 艾玛似乎总是比办公室里其他人更早听到八卦的风声。

Example: Don't expect Charlie to help you;he is just a fair-weather friend.
ExampleTranslation: 不要指望查理会帮助你，他不过是个酒肉朋友。

Example: The manager didn't resign.Instead;he weathered the storm.
ExampleTranslation: 那位经理并没有辞职。相反地，他渡过了这次的难关。

Example: Our team's future is still up in the air.
ExampleTranslation: 我们团队的前途仍悬而未决。

Word: make hay while the sun shines
Example: We should make hay while the sun shines and take advantage of this opportunity.
ExampleTranslation: 我们应该不误时机，好好利用这次机会。

Example: John threw caution to the wind and dived into the water.
ExampleTranslation: 约翰不顾风险就潜人水里。
